text: I am thinking of you in my sleepless solitude tonight. If it's wrong to love you, then my heart just won't let me be right cause I'm drowned in you and I won't pull through without you by my side.
author: Mariah Carey

text: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, 'I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.

text: Lord knows . Dreams are hard to follow . But don't let anyone . Tear them away . Hold On . There will be tomorrow . In time you'll find the way.

text: You brighten up the moon and stars at night You keep me seeing rainbows in the sky You bring new meaning to my life, now I believe in miracles
author: Mariah Carey

text: But I didn't wanna face the truth . That I was only being used . And you was just fronting .
author: Mariah Carey

text: We promised to keep it casual . But at times it can be so difficult . This relationship, so untypical . And I can't understand .
author: Mariah Carey

text: First you love ma and then you leave me . And then I'm falling back in your arms . There's no conclusion, it's so deceiving . Cause I get taken in by your charms .
author: Mariah Carey

text: You've got me feeling emotions . Deeper than I've ever dreamed of . You've got me feeling emotions .

text: I know I can be diva-ish sometimes, but I have to be in control. The nature of my life, the nature of what I do, is divadom, it really is.
author: Mariah Carey

text: In this world, I call the shots and I think I know best.
author: Mariah Carey
